name: Hard Words That Repeat Themselves Quiz / Test | Thematic Fun | 10 Questions

questions.text: Kava Kava is an herbal remedy that is primarily used to aid what?
questions.explanation:
Mood.

	It is said to be helpful with depression, tension, etc.

questions.text: The Mau Mau rebellion in the 1950's in Africa occurred in what country?
Beri Beri is a deficiency disorder that results from lack of which vitamin?

questions.explanation:
Food.

	Near East and Middle East, among other places

questions.text: Simone Simon (Both names are pronounced the same) is best known for starring in what movie?
questions.explanation:
Cat People.

	I'm hard-pressed to think of another one that she made.

questions.text: Pago Pago (pronounced Pongo Pongo) is a part of?
Hitihiti is a character in what literary work?
questions.explanation:
Mutiny on the Bounty.

	He's the island chieftain when the Bounty reaches Tahiti.

questions.text: 'Ack Ack' is a term that is used to describe?
questions.explanation:
Guns and Gunfire.

	During the twentieth century the term came to refer to anti-aircraft guns and the sound that they made.

Magic.

	It is a belief system that contains elements of magic, voodoo, religion, etc.
